descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset was created by our in-house web scraping and data mining teams at [PromptCloud](https://www.promptcloud.com/) and [DataStock](https://datastock.shop/). This dataset contains the sample of the full Amazon Fashion Products Dataset 2020 from DataStock. 

There was a lot of data that was available from Amazon particularly in the year 2020. It was web scraped and bundled into a dataset for various analytical purposes.

You can download the full dataset from our data repository [here](https://app.datastock.shop/?site_name=Amazon_Fashion_Products_2020). 

### Content

This dataset contains the following:
Total Records Count : 132685  
Domain Name : amazon.com  
Date Range : 01st Feb 2020 - 30th Apr 2020   
File Extension : ldjson

Available Fields: 
uniq_id-- The unique ID of the product 
crawl_timestamp-- The time of the crawl to pull the data
asin-- The ASIN of the product
product_url-- The URL of the product
product_name-- The name of the product
image_urls__small-- The url of the images in small size
medium-- The medium by which the product was seen
large-- the size of the file
browsenode
seller_name-- the name of the seller of the product 
seller_id-- the ID of the seller of the product
brand-- the brand of the product
sales_price-- the price of the sale of the product 
discount_percentage-- the discount that was being offered on the product
weight-- the weight of the product
rating-- the rating of the product
no__of_reviews-- The number of reviews that have been given to the product
delivery_type-- the type of delivery the product will be delivered to the buyer
meta_keywords-- the keywords used to search for the product
amazon_prime__y_or_n-- If the buyer has an amazon prime membership or no
best_seller_tag__y_or_n-- the tag of bestseller or no
technical_details__k_v_pairs-- the repair was given or no

### Acknowledgements

We wouldn't be here without the help of our in-house web scraping and data mining teams at [PromptCloud](https://www.promptcloud.com/) and [DataStock](https://datastock.shop/).

### Inspiration
This dataset was created keeping in mind our data scientists and researchers across the world.
title: Amazon Fashion Products 2020
subtitle: Fashion Products from Amazon 2020
